item.title: About me
item.description: I am Oliver Roß, a Computer scientist from Innsbruck, Austria. After completing a BSc. in Physics at the University of Innsbruck, I enrolled for the Master’s program of Computer Science. Here, my focus has been on information security, cryptography and machine learning. I have experience with C, Python and Bash. During my studies I use Latex extensively, also for presentations with beamer and tikz. Currently I am working on my master thesis on replicating the membership inference attack against machine learning models.
